features: Granite Non Stick Coating – The Granite Non Stick interior of frying pan skillet is Eco-friendly nonstick granite stone coating, which is SGS approved, with 100% Free of PFOS, PFOA, PFAS. This nonstick pan is making your daily cooking safer and healthier, cooking with less oil for healthy diet. This ultra-nonstick is for effortless cooking.

Heats Quickly & Evenly – This non stick skillet pan with extended bottom construction is made for conducting heat quickly and evenly with precise temperature control and not hot spot. The Granite frying pan is designed for professional multiple cooking use, pans for cooking, egg pan, cooking pan, omelet pan, sauté pan, egg skillet, induction pan.

Professional Designed – Suitable for Induction and all other stoves. The Granite Stone frying pan with Bakelite handles are designed to stay cool on the stovetop, and easy to grip. The hanging loop of the 8 inch frying pan is for convenient for storage. Hi-temp exterior provides stain and wear-resistant, safe for all heat sources. The perfect nonstick frying pan is the best cooking partner for you, with heavy gauge and extra durable die-cast construction, this skillet will last longer time.

ECO Friendly NON TOXIC – This non stick pan is pans for cooking with less oil needed and less smoke released. This nonstick frying pan is ideal for healthy cooking, less oil use for healthy diet. Choose Easy chef always Frying Pan for greener and healthier cooking. This is totally easy handle granite stone frying pan.

Easy to Clean – Besides its wonderful nonstick and quick clean performance, this nonstick cooking pan is dishwasher safe, but most messes can wipe away easily. Simply wipe it over with a sponge and warm soapy water. It’s a perfect non stick fry pan, every day cooking pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's now the best pan in the kitchen!
reviews.reviewText: This little pan is ideal for cooking on an electric radiant heat stove. It cooks amazingly evenly and cleans quickly as well. The price is a plus as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice pan
reviews.reviewText: This is my 2nd granite pan. They cook evenly and are SUPER easy to clean. They are non stick. Eggs don’t stick. You just wipe it out with a paper towel. This is a nice looking pan. My favorite part is that they covered the rivets with the granite material. The aren’t covered on my other pan so I have to scrub those to get rid of any scrambled egg. This one I don’t. Game changer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this is the best little egg pan I've ever had
reviews.reviewText: eggs never stick makes a beautiful omelet priced low i would reccomend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: It’s ok, cooks your food well…. Doesn’t cook fast, and it’s not flat as it should be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this pen to replace my old 10 inch Teflon. I only need lower heat, but I find I cook on high with everything I do. I have had no troubles whatsoever with this other than the handle coming a little loose so I tightened it myself no problems, clean ZEZE and never sticks it’s always dependable if I had something negative to say I thought it would have been a little bit bigger or should I say wider three eggs over easy no problem though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy-duty ceramic 8" pan
reviews.reviewText: Nice ceramic frying pan. Eggs do not stick when frying. Heavy duty handle. Easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great induction frypan
reviews.reviewText: Non stick feature is excellent.The pan comes with a small flat head screwdriver for attaching the handle. Dont use. Please use a bigger screwdriver to properly secure the handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nonstick small sauce pot
reviews.reviewText: The only problem I have is that it is heavy and I was looking for a small lighter pot but this will do because it is easy to clean and cooks evenly. I also like the wood handle so there is no need for a potholder.
Très agréable et ne colle pas
Me encantó y tiene un buen tamaño
